subtitle: This tasty and colourful bell pepper assortment makes a perfect vegetable side dish to grilled and roasted meats.

method.text: Heat the oil in a pan. Add onions and garlic and fry gently for 5 min, ensuring that they do not brown.
Add the peppers with the remaining ingredients. Mix thoroughly. Cover pan and cook for 15 min - but do not allow the peppers to become too soft.
Serve immediately in a warmed serving dish.

title: Pepperonata
